website_summaries.verdict: The very best infant car seat on the market today. Designed and engineered with a focus on safety.
pros: Superior safety ratings and ease of installation
Comes equipped with every safety feature imaginable
cons: Fabric can make babies sweat if they are heavily bundled

customer_reviews.title: WE WERE IN A CAR ACCIDENT WITH THIS SEAT!!
customer_reviews.text: We have loved this car seat because of it's easy installation. We always felt comfortable putting our baby in it. We were in a pretty serious car accident with our six month old daughter a few weeks ago. It was a head on collision going about 45 mph. We inspected her immediately after and she has been perfectly fine ever since. After, we were borrowing another car seat of a different brand while we were figuring out a new seat for her and it just felt cheap compared to the Chicco Keyfit 30. We will definitely be purchasing this car seat for our future children.
customer_reviews.author: rory ashdown

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful seat!
customer_reviews.text: Best infant car seat we've ever owned. We have 3 children now and had a britax and our baby would just scream and cry. We got this seat and she is so content and happy! We made a 12 hr road trip when she was just 3 weeks old and she was amazing! Slept so good and fit so snug in the seat without being quished like the britax. I highly recommend this seat!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Loved our first Chicco Keyfit so much, when I found out we were having twins the second time around, I purchased another one! Easy to install, simple to put a tiny newborn in, and easy to adjust when that baby starts growing. Most importantly, it's SAFE!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: My wife and I both love Chicco. I am a bargain hunter and love ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I both love Chicco. I am a bargain hunter and love to get the best bang for my buck, but a decision we made was that if there was an area we would not skimp, it was our children's safety. We tested and researched multiple brands and kept coming back to Chicco. From infant to toddler, the quality and comfort of their child seats exceeds anything else we tried. The price may be a bit higher, but it's more than worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Apollyon1339

customer_reviews.title: Open the box possibly used car seat
customer_reviews.text: This box has already been opened which makes me think that this car seat was returned and has been used .
customer_reviews.author: Sara Litra

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted a little more than a year before kids out grew them. Go cheap on these initial seats and save for the upright forward facing ones. Nice product, but not worth $250.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: A+ Car seat
customer_reviews.text: I really like this car seat. It feels far safer than other models I have had in the past. It’s extremely easy to install, and for the most part you can spot clean it easily. I do wish that Chicco had more designs/colors to choose from, although the simple and neutral colors are just fine. I will add though that this car seat is MUCH heavier than I thought it would be. I used to be able to cart my daughters Graco car seat around just fine, this one feels very heavy compared to others. I wish the stroller that’s made to fit this car seat wasn’t so outrageously expensive for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this seat!
customer_reviews.text: Love chicco! We actually had an older onw for my daugter and older son. This is our second. Best thing about it so easy to clean. Undo a couple snaps and throw it in the wash! So easy to click into the car and out again. We also have a keyfit stroller that it clips into so easy. The only con: it's heavy! We prefer to just carry the baby if he's not asleep. Totally worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Durgin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, seems safe, but heavy.
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with the car seat, but it is heavy! I don't have anything to compare it with, but it is way too heavy for me to carry the seat with the 15lb baby in it for longer than a few feet (i.e. distance from car to stroller).
customer_reviews.author: B. W.

customer_reviews.title: Best Car Seat Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying the Chicco KeyFit 30. Used the last one for a year with my first child, then upgraded to a different color with this new baby. It’s easy to use, easy to install, looks great, and has amazing safety reviews. We also have the stroller caddy that is a must-have! You won’t regret buying this car seat.
customer_reviews.author: ConlonTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by NICU nurses, and firemen, too
customer_reviews.text: The infant insert got the seal of approval from the hospital inspector for our 5 lb. 14 oz. preemie to come home in. Ridiculously easy to install with the latch system. Adjusting straps straightforward, too. They only thing recommended was to temporarily lose the shoulder pads until our little guy is a little taller to ensure a safe, and snug fit. Easy enough, which is exactly what I want in a car seat.
customer_reviews.author: cooutsidemom

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install with the built-in level and easy overall once you get the hang of it. Comes with the newborn insert so you don’t have to chase one down. I have weak arms but can still carry this easily with a newborn in it.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Rutherford

customer_reviews.title: Great seat- easier to get tight fit than britax, but they sent a model that’s 1.5years old
customer_reviews.text: Great seat. Amazon warehouse sent a model that’s 1.5 years old. When these expire, manufacturing date is important
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat!
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these! And I recommend it. It’s really great car seat, durable and sturdy although it’s a little heavy for me. Al in all it’s worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I had a britax for my first baby but needed a Chico to fit my double stroller. I’m a true britax fan but this won me over. My son never sleeps better than when he’s in here and it looks cozy and safe!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Eaton

customer_reviews.title: I also love being able to get my daughter in and out ...
customer_reviews.text: After a lot of research, I decided that this would be the infant car seat for my family. Safety and reliability are obviously my top priorities. I also love being able to get my daughter in and out of the car quickly. I purchased the Chicco car seat frame to go with the seat and they work wonderfully together.
customer_reviews.author: Anjali

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves car seat. The inner padding molds great around my new granddaughter. The carrier clicks into the base in car to make a wonderful, safe car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Wilma W. Tate

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and goes great with my Uppababy Vista stroller. It's pretty light weight, easy to adjust the straps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The car seat itself is not terribly light once the baby is in the seat
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient click in and out of the base which we keep in the car. The car seat itself is not terribly light once the baby is in the seat. Also, it is a bit difficult to rotate the carrying handle back over the sun-cover and vice versa. Would like the sun cover to come a bit more anterior on the seat as well. Very attractive seat, though, and very comfortable. Very easy to put the baby in and out. Would not hesitate to but this again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Looks very comfortable and safe
customer_reviews.text: Looks very comfortable and safe, nothing extra needed to add for baby since it is very padded already. It also has anchor hooks which make the mobility of the carseat better.
customer_reviews.author: Jorgelina Warsaw

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good value and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Chicco seat. It’s a good value and easy to install. We were able to find adapters for our bob and vista strollers as well.
customer_reviews.author: John Falkowski II

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had this for my 1st 2 kids!
customer_reviews.text: Slim carseat allows for this and my 2 convertible carseats in the same row. Lightweight ans the easiest carseat I've ever installed!
customer_reviews.author: amwood

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, I've used this car seat for 2 of my kids. Easy to adjust, I'm really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, baby’s look safe and comfortable in it.
customer_reviews.author: T.Y

customer_reviews.title: So easy to intall and get in and out of ths ...
customer_reviews.text: So easy to intall and get in and out of ths car. I really liked the infant insert to help fit around our baby comfortably- it helped keep his hear upright.
customer_reviews.author: Moe M.

customer_reviews.title: lightweight. doesn't feel safe enough
customer_reviews.text: very light cheap seat with minimal padding. will be purchasing a much sturdier seat as soon as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer lee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We love our car seat!! It was easy to install and it’s easy to take in and out. Our baby seems comfortable in it. And I love the neutral colors
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat!
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is great. Very durable and sturdy. I really wanted something safe after being in a bad car accident and this is perfect. It is super easy to get in and out if the base. My baby actually doesn't mind being in it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: prittykitty21

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic seat, Chicco is the best
customer_reviews.text: This is our fourth Chicco purchase (two strollers, two infant seats) and we are very pleased. Chicco infant seats are easy to install and uninstall, easy to use, and, in our opinions, minimize user installation error greatly. With our dedication to safety, we feel that's a primary feature of this seat! It is a little heavy with baby now being just under 20 lbs, but we just don't take the seat out of the van as much anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi7002

customer_reviews.title: Comes with base!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use with or without the base but so much easier with base. Came with base so I was glad! Wonderful product
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a present and I haven't heard any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: KED

customer_reviews.title: Chicco keyfit is a great car seat!
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is very light weight and easy to maneuver. The base is easy to install. Overall, we really liked our Chicco keyfit!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: The latch just gets stuck sometimes when I try to get it out of the car. Otherwise I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amz Cstmr

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, even for Nana!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this car seat for when I keep my grandaughter. Boy have things changed since I had my boys!!! The base is super easy to install and latching and unlatching the car seat is a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: cb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: super easy to installed in the car. still waiting to put baby in there
customer_reviews.author: Anali

customer_reviews.title: Excellent car seat used for almost a full year from ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent car seat used for almost a full year from birth. Flexible configurations as the child grows and sturdy enough to be handled in and out of the car as well as the stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Angela davis

customer_reviews.title: Great-grandson loves his new seat!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this car seat for our new great-grandson. He weighted 11 1/2 lbs. at birth so he needed a sturdy well built car seat. My granddaughter is very pleased with this car seat.
customer_reviews.author: szyszy

customer_reviews.title: Easier than the Graco 4ever to tighten
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love this car seat for our new little one. It is light and easy to tighten. Glad we paid more for a quality seat.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is its an awesome infant car seat! Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this carseat! Super easy install and the baby doesn't mind our long trips!
customer_reviews.author: Lulz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice seat/carrier, super easy to install with the latch system.
customer_reviews.author: George A. Goode II

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: was a gift for son and wife they love it.
customer_reviews.author: FredAidoo

customer_reviews.title: This car seat is absolutely fantastic! It was a good balance of price
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is absolutely fantastic! It was a good balance of price, features, and safety for my baby. The infant insert made the baby very comfortable when being transported, she would fall asleep for just about every car ride. She's now outgrown the infant insert and she is still just as comfortable without it. The weight of the seat is not too heavy, and was not too difficult to carry around when catching a flight with the baby. It also fits into a Chicco Keyfit stroller smoothly so it's really a convenient system all around.
customer_reviews.author: Denni Sleznick

customer_reviews.title: Great seat
customer_reviews.text: The base makes this so easy to put into and get out of the car! There is a button on the seat that makes tightening and loosening the straps super easy! The leveling gauges on the base make it easy to be sure that your little one is level in your car. First car seat we have owned but would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Top Rated Car Seat
customer_reviews.text: this was a gift and it was truly appreciated. This is one of the highest rated car seats with many benefits. Can't lose with it.
customer_reviews.author: VCLee

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat! Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this car seat and the fact that my baby is not moving or going anywhere and is totally safe!
customer_reviews.author: Jamila Jones

customer_reviews.title: Daughter in law was happy..
customer_reviews.text: Daughter in law was happy. ..let you know when baby is born and it's actually used. ..it's what she wanted ..so extremely happy for they
customer_reviews.author: Teri M.

customer_reviews.title: ... son's car seat I can tell it'll be much better!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't installed it but compared to my first son's car seat I can tell it'll be much better!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The infant car seat is great it works and safe for my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Musa

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color. Wanted same one in black .
customer_reviews.text: Received the wrong color. Wanted same car seat but in black
customer_reviews.author: gina fahey

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and easy install
customer_reviews.text: I’m really happy with the Chicco keyfit 30. I’ve installed multiple car seats over the years, and this Base was by far the easiest and quickest out of all! The seat has a high weight limit and Looks like it will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Smyth

product_meta.title: Chicco Keyfit Infant Car Seat and Base with Car Seat, Papyrus
product_meta.description:
The #1-rated Chicco KeyFit 30 Infant Car Seat is engineered with innovative features that make it the easiest infant car seat to install simply, accurately, and securely every time. The KeyFit 30's stay-in-car base has a ReclineSure leveling foot and two RideRight bubble level-indicators to help achieve and verify proper angle in the vehicle seat. The base is also equipped with premium LATCH connectors and a SuperCinch tightener for a secure fit with a fraction of the effort! For alternate installation with the vehicle seat belt, clear belt routing and integrated lock-offs make it easy to position, tighten and lock the belt into place. A smooth underside helps protect vehicle seats from damage. 

The car seat carrier includes removable head and body support to accommodate newborns as small as 4 pounds. A five-point harness with one-pull tightening helps keep baby secure, and the carrier shell is lined with EPS energy-absorbing foam for improved impact protection. An adjustable, removable canopy provides shade from the sun. Care and Maintenance - Machine wash fabrics separately in cold water on delicate cycle. Do not use bleach; drip dry. Plastics and hardware may be sponge cleaned using warm water and mild soap; towel dry. To clean harness, sponge clean using warm water and mild soap; air dry. Do not machine wash harness

The KeyFit 30 is designed for travel system use with compatible strollers from Chicco. The carrier secures easily to the base and strollers with a reassuring audible click. A two-position carry-handle and one-hand release make it just as easy to remove.

For use from 4-30 lbs and up to 30".

• #1-rated infant car seat in America 
• ReclineSure leveling foot helps achieve proper base angle
• RideRight bubble level-indicators verify base angle 
• SuperCinch LATCH tightener helps achieve a secure fit 
• Removable newborn head and body support
• Removable canopy provides shade
• Compatible with Chicco strollers for travel system use
• 5-point harness with one-pull tightener
• Carrier shell lined with EPS energy-absorbing foam for improved impact protection
• Smooth underside helps protect vehicle seats

BRAND STORY
By Chicco
feature_bullets: Seat interior lined with EPS energy-absorbing foam for improved impact protection
Infant insert for smaller babies from 4-30 lbs
Adjustable, multi position canopy , Carton Dimensions - 17.32 x 14.96 x 27.95 inches
